item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with hats and songs. Lots of fun and insight about your personality and others. Herb will touch on using the Enneagram for spiritual growth. Fine just to show up.

Herb Pearce is a leading expert on the Enneagram with over 20 years teaching it to thousands of people. He is an Enneagram therapist and coach, particularly regarding relationships. 781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com

at Calvary United Methodist Church
200 Turner Road
Middletown, RI
401 847 6181
Thursday, February 3
7:30 pm - 9:00 pm
($10 - Fine to show up at the door)
item.name: Enneagram Workshop - Middletown, RI
